newsitem.title: USA: Consolidated Freightways sets stock plan.
newsitem.headline: Consolidated Freightways sets stock plan.

text.p: Consolidated Freightways Inc Monday unveiled an employee stock plan under which many employees will be eligible for 35 restricted common shares based on achieving certain goals.
Under the plan, about 1.0 million shares could be distributed, representing about 4.5 percent of the outstanding shares with a market value of about $15.5 million.
About two-thirds of those restricted shares are being awarded to employees covered by collective bargaining labor agreements.

All full-time contractual employees in the United States and Canada will be eligible to receive the shares in three installments. Criteria include stock price performance and continued employment service until the stock price goals are achieved.
